product_name: BaBylissPRONano Titanium XL Spring Curling Iron
summary: SummaryBaBylissPRO Nano Titanium XL Spring Curling Iron evenly distributes high heat up to 430ÂºF to create long-lasting curls with radiant shine. The barrel is 2'' longer than the traditional curling iron, making it perfect for styling longer lengths.
details: DetailsBenefitsGently creates long-lasting loose curls and beach waves on longer hair.FeaturesAdditional 2" longer barrel than traditional curling ironsEven heat distribution for gentler styling5 digital temperature settings - up to 430Â°FUltra-lightweight for maximum comfort8 foot swivel cordLimited 2-year warrantyDual VoltageItem 2599910How To UseSee package for usage details.

reviews.headline: Great curling iron! Although it gets super HOT!!!
reviews.comments: Overall, this is a great curling iron. I love the extra length. The only drawback is it gets really hot. You just have to be very careful.

reviews.headline: Incredible
reviews.comments: I bought this curling iron after returning the BioIonic long barrel curling iron and WOW I am so much happier with this one. The curls from the BioIonic lasted 5 minutes and my hair is the kind of hair that will hold a curl for days on end. I have thick, coarse, wavy, frizzy hair and was able to curl all my hair with the BabyBliss in 30 minutes on the 355 degrees setting. Brushed out to waves beautifully. So happy with my purchase.

reviews.headline: Heats quickly and evenly
reviews.comments:
I purchased this product after noting it is the brand my hair stylist uses. I have stubbornly straight hair any many other curling irons do not put a lasting curl in my hair. This iron has me stunned I have curls that hold for days now. 

The longer barrel makes curling my hair when it was longer much easier and now with shorter hair, it goes so quickly. I like that it has a temperature gauge instead of odd arbitrary numbers. The button is recessed and requires a long press to turn on and off  so no accidental shut offs while it is in operation. The clamp is strong and holds my thin hair in place securely without pulling or being difficult to press or operate. The kick stand is small and flimsy but I just make sure to set it on something with a bit of grip when heated up to prevent any burns.

reviews.headline: No temperature control extremely hot
reviews.comments: I am returning this curling iron, purchased on 7/20. I used it for the first time today, 7/21. At the third setting (355Â°F), the plastic on the clip and the tip of the iron were too hot to touch, as was the curling iron itself. I lowered it to the first setting (285Â°F), but the issue persisted. Even after turning it off, the curling iron remained extremely hot 20 minutes later.

reviews.headline: Returned it immediately
reviews.comments: Way too heavy. Snagged hair. Hard to use on myself and others.

reviews.headline: Returning it immediately
reviews.comments: This curling iron was a huge disappointment. The curls it produces were limp and sad, and my hair doesn't glide easily like it did with my old cheap ceramic curling iron. Even after a straight blow dry, my hair kept sticking. I'm returning this immediately and going back to ceramic!

reviews.headline: no
reviews.comments:
several things I don't like (and nothing i do):
- bulky... like, REALLY bulky 
- curl doesn't hold
- no auto shut-off (I know I should've noticed sooner, but still, why on earth...)

reviews.headline: It is so good. I love it
reviews.comments: 100 percent I recommend it

reviews.headline: Curls don't last
reviews.comments: I was inbetween this one and the bio ionic, and I wish I opted for the bio ionic instead. The curls don't last at all, and my hair usually doesn't have a problem with a curl lasting.

reviews.headline: Dont waste your money
reviews.comments: Please do not waster your money on this curling iron. I wanted to splurge on a more expensive curling iron and though this would be a great choice. Boy was I wrong. My hair holds curl very well, with other curling irons and even straighteners. When I curl my hair with the Babyliss, the curls do not even stay until my whole head it done. Within an hour my hair has zero curl. This has NEVER happened curling other brands. I have used multiple different methods and all different products to try and make this curling iron work well. I am so upset I missed the window to return this item.

reviews.headline: I LOVED it but it broke after 3 mo
reviews.comments: I loved this iron I used ut as a wand an iron and everything I could think of. I loved how it was able to smooth ny hair out beffore curling so I didnt have to straighten if first. It seriously was the best i ever bought and then it went and stopped working on me I swear cried. Im legitimately thinking if dissecting it and trying to play electrican hust to get it back !'

reviews.headline: Not good
reviews.comments: On the second lowest heat setting, this curling iron would not glide through my hair at all. It stuck horribly. I even tried washing, blow drying my hair smooth, then trying to curl it, and it still didn't help. Returned it ASAP.

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I bought this curling iron and it didn't work. No big deal, I exchanged it. It worked for about 6 months and quit. It's doing the same thing the first one did. I've had a BaByliss hair dryer for years. This curling iron just isn't the same quality.

reviews.headline: Disappointing Design from BaByliss
reviews.comments:
I bought the curling iron with the 1.5" barrel for my 17 year old daughter. We both love our BaByliss flat irons and blow dryers, so I thought this was sure to be a winner. Unfortunately, there are a couple of what I would consider design flaws. 
1) The way the clamp is designed, the part where you press to open the clamp is very close to metal that gets very hot from the curling iron, and both she and I keep missing the right spot to put our finger and kept burning ourselves. 
2) There is a portion at the top of the barrel where it's not metal, and there is a small protrusion on it for some reason, and that snags the hair as we unwind the curling iron. See picture for a better understanding of what I mean.
We really wanted to love this, but it was a miss for us.

reviews.headline: Love this curler!!
reviews.comments: I got this over a hear ago and it is still my fav curling iron.

reviews.headline: Curling iron
reviews.comments: I have super thick hair and love how fast it heats up!

reviews.headline: It was Great, THEN quit working
reviews.comments: I really like this iron it was very smooth good to my hair,  then after about 4 or 5 months, one morning,  it just wouldn't heat up, good thing I did not have to go anywhere that day.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I'm a hairstylist and love using this tool not only on myself but on my clients behind the chair. The long barrel allows me to go faster when styling hair! The price point is worth it.

reviews.headline: So thrilled
reviews.comments: This curling iron heats up quickly and gives my hair the perfect curls!

reviews.headline: Not the best.
reviews.comments:
I wanted to like this curling iron, but it's horrible. It leaves my hair smelling fried and i use it at a low setting. I use heat protector and it always makes my hair smell so bad. It takes days for the smell to go away. On top of that, the curls dont even last. So im damaging my hair for nothing!!! 
Unfortunately the return window had closed so ive been stuck with it for years.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I recently tried the Babyliss Pro Nano Titanium XL Spring Curling Iron and I must say I am thoroughly impressed with this product. One of the things I love about it is the multiple temperature settings which make it easy to use on my thick and dense hair. The curls come out perfectly every time and the iron heats up quickly and maintains a consistent temperature, preventing any heat damage to my hair.

The curling iron is also very user-friendly and easy to use, with a comfortable grip and a long swivel cord that allows for flexibility while styling. Another feature I appreciate is the automatic shut-off function, which gives me peace of mind knowing that the iron won't stay on and potentially cause any damage.

Overall, the Babyliss Pro Nano Titanium XL Spring Curling Iron is an amazing product that I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a reliable and versatile curling iron. Its multiple temperature settings, ease of use, and safety features make it a must-have for anyone who wants to achieve salon-quality curls at home.
faceoff_positive.headline: great iron!

faceoff_negative.comments:
The BaByliss Pro Nano Titanium 1" Extended Barrel Curling Iron has a longer barrel than most, which is great for long hair.  It heats up quickly.  There are five temperature settings up to 430 degrees.  It has a cool tip to grip and help handle the curling iron without getting burned. I was given this curling iron for free in exchange for my honest review.  I really wanted to like it.

I was very disappointed in the curl and hold.  My hair typically is easy to curl and holds curls for a long time.  I had trouble getting much curl at all even though I wound it up all the way to my scalp on the hottest setting and held it until my hair was heated through very well.  Only the ends were slightly curled.  And as soon as I fingered through the curls they were gone. This just will not do.  I spent a lot of time trying to get my hair to curl and with this curling iron, it seems impossible. Afterwards my hair looks stringy.  I cannot recommend this to anyone.
faceoff_negative.headline: Hair Would NOT Curl
